archetypes.name: Explorer
archetypes.definition: A diner who actively seeks novelty and experimentation, preferring new cuisines, unfamiliar dishes, and unique food experiences.

archetypes.name: Purist
archetypes.definition: A diner who prioritizes food quality, craftsmanship, and authenticity above all else.
signals: Chooses restaurants based on taste rather than hype
Evaluates dishes by technique and authenticity

archetypes.name: Social Curator
archetypes.definition: A diner who values the social experience of dining, choosing restaurants that enhance group interactions and shared memories.

archetypes.name: Trend Seeker
archetypes.definition: A diner driven by popularity, hype, and what is currently trending on social platforms.
core_motivations: Being early to try popular restaurants
signals: Checks reviews and social platforms before deciding
Visits restaurants with strong online presence
Values brand recognition and social proof

archetypes.name: Conformist
archetypes.definition: A diner who prefers familiarity, comfort, and predictable food experiences, avoiding unnecessary risk.

archetypes.name: Aestheticist
archetypes.definition: A diner who values the visual experience—ambience, décor, interior design, and photogenic food presentation.
signals: Often takes photos of food and surroundings
